{
	dataproduct(
		id: "{{ .dataproduct_id }}"
	) {
		name
		description
        owner {
            group
        }
	}
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "dataproduct": {
      "name": "NewName",
      "description": "New description",
      "owner": {
        "group": "team@nav.no"
      },
    }
  }
}
